data: It was late on a cold November night in the city of Boston, the sky was obscured by dark, stormy clouds, a bleak wind was whistling through the almost deserted streets, and the lights in the lamps flickered dimly.
Frank Reade, Jr., and His Electric Ice Ship; or, Driven Adrift in the Frozen Sky.
